TestDescription.name: PHP Safedir restriction bypass vulnerabilities

WASPDescription.DetailsFormat: The script has been tested with these parameter values : ${combinations}

TestDescription.Description: [coolbox][dark]This alert was generated using only banner information. It may be a false positive. [/dark][/coolbox][break]PHP is prone to multiple vulnerabilities that permit an attacker to bypass the 'safedir' directory restriction. An attacker can exploit these vulnerabilities to possible execute arbitrary code currently existing on a vulnerable system, or to retrieve the contents of arbitrary files, all in the security context of the Web server process. [break][break][navy]Affected PHP version 5.5.0.[/navy][break]
TestDescription.Recommendation: Upgrade PHP to the latest version.
